name: rotki
description: Rotki is a self-hosted portfolio tracking and accounting tool for cryptocurrencies and DeFi platforms with full privacy. It features real-time reporting, tax tools, and a GUI with encrypted storage.
features: Portfolio tracking: Monitor cryptocurrency holdings across exchanges and wallets in real-time.
DeFi integration: Track positions in lending protocols, liquidity pools, and yield farms.
Tax reporting: Generate tax reports for cryptocurrency transactions and capital gains.
Privacy focused: Store all data locally with encrypted databases for complete privacy.
Multi-chain support: Track assets on Ethereum, Bitcoin, and other blockchain networks.
Historical data: View portfolio performance over time with charts and analytics.
Transaction import: Import trades from exchanges via CSV or API connections.
Cost basis tracking: Calculate accurate profit and loss using FIFO, LIFO, or other methods.
NFT support: Track NFT holdings and valuations across marketplaces.
Custom assets: Add manual entries for assets not automatically detected.
Desktop application: Use native apps for Windows, macOS, and Linux with full functionality.
Export functionality: Download reports in CSV or PDF format for accountants or records.
